meanings.definition: A person or thing that occurs or is done only once.
meanings.sent1: The rare comet was a oncer in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The solar eclipse was a oncer event that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The oncer appearance of a shooting star made the night magical.
meanings.sent4: The oncer opportunity to see a rainbow in the desert was truly special.
meanings.sent5: The oncer appearance of a double rainbow left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The surprise party was a oncer for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent2: The oncer snowfall in the desert was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The oncer visit of a penguin to the beach caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The oncer chance to witness a meteor shower was unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The oncer occurrence of a blue moon made the night magical.
